meanings.definition: The state or quality of being loony.
meanings.sent1: Her looniness was evident in her wild and unpredictable behavior.
meanings.sent2: The looniness of the clown made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: The looniness of the situation was so absurd that it felt like a comedy sketch.
meanings.sent4: The looniness of the old house gave it a mysterious and eerie vibe.
meanings.sent5: The looniness of the cat's antics entertained the whole family.

meanings.definition: The behavior or actions of a loony person.
meanings.sent1: His looniness at the party was hard to miss as he danced on tables.
meanings.sent2: The looniness of the patient worried the hospital staff.
meanings.sent3: The looniness of the jester brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The looniness of the child's imagination knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The looniness of the professor's lectures kept the students engaged.
